transcript:
Customer: Ya Allahu Ya Rahman Ya Rahim Ya Karim Ya Allah.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan ji sir kaise hain?

Customer: Main bahut badhiya ji aap kaise hain?

Executive: Theek hai sir.

Customer: Haan pe office pe pahunch gaye ya ghar pe hai abhi?

Executive: Main raste mein hun ja raha hun.

Customer: Sir raste mein hai? Achcha sir woh bataiye kal woh aapka concern aaya tha kal parso woh kya concern tha sir actually aapka woh kya concern tha?

Customer: Woh toh shayad mere dhyan se nikal gaya.

Executive: Kuch kuch location se related tha kya sir? Koi location se related aisa kuch tha ya phir buylead se related tha?

Customer: Woh shayad profile ke uss pe tha woh jo aa raha hai likha hua wahan pe profile pe.

Executive: Achcha. Rating wagera hamari koi di thi nahi raha ki hamari kaise humne rating badhani hai kya karna hai usme di thi nahi raha.

Customer: Achcha okay. Pehla ek toh concern aapka mujhe yeh dikh raha tha sir ki jo buylead hai jab aap open kar rahe ho toh purani buylead aa rahi hai char ghante se pehle ki buylead aa rahi hai aisa kuch tha.

Customer: Ji ji ji ji haan yeh.

Executive: Right ek concern haan ek toh concern aapka yeh tha. Dusra yeh tha jo main system mein dekh ke samajh pa raha hun aapne BLNI option ko mark kiya tha. Jisme kuch products ko aapne non-relevant mark kiya tha sir. Lagbhag nau products ko aapne kiya tha. Right? Toh woh jo location dekh ke kiya tha woh product base pe kiya tha ki product nahi chalenge ya location un location pe deal nahi karna isliye?

Customer: Sir location okay ab jo location mein humne mark kiya tha ek toh Ranchi ka kiya tha. Mumbai ka kiya tha, Rangareddy ka kiya tha toh yeh jo location hai in locations pe hamari jo dealing hai basically kam rehti hai yahan se humko inquiry wali nahi chahiye.

Executive: Ji ji.

Executive: Okay aur jo hamari sir Delhi, Gurgaon yeh jo Uttar Pradesh ka jo nearest nearest jo shehar hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Inka sahi zyada.

Executive: Okay. Okay. Humne jo buylead apni di hai jo consume hum kar rahe hain ek minute ruko. Yeh category city report ki agar main baat karun hum jo kar rahe hain jo buylead ka jo kar rahe hain Moradabad, Delhi, Dehradun, Patiala, Patna, Saharanpur, Ghaziabad, Bulandshahr, Badi in sab in sab ki buylead hum kar rahe hain.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Aur jo hamari major jo preferred cities hai ek minute rukiye jo main yahan pe check kar raha hun. Ah jo district hai district wise agar main baat karun apna jo kaam hai Delhi mein sabse zyada hai jo hum kar rahe hain.

Customer: Ji Delhi mein zyada hai.

Executive: Aur Delhi ke baad Gurgaon Delhi ke aas paas ka yeh area hai. Dehradun ho gaya. Hmm hmm. Yeh idhar ke jo hamare aas paas ke padte hain hum yahan party ka aana bhi aasan rehta hai aur hamara jana aana bhi.

Customer: Exactly toh bilkul top 10 cities mein hamari jo aa gayi Dehradun, Patiala, New Delhi, Shimla, Belagavi, Ujjain, Mumbai, Bulandshahr, Ghaziabad aur Meerut. Moradabad UP tak Noida tak yeh ja raha hai hamara jo main preferred city ki main baat kar raha hun. Right inki listing mapping set karte hain sir. Dusri cheez yeh hai sir hamari jo IndiaMART hai sir jo aapka IndiaMART ek din mein kitni baar open karte ho yeh bataiye sir mujhe.

Customer: Yeh koi paanch se saat baar bas.

Executive: Paanch se saat baar.

Executive: Toh paanch se saat baar mein jab open karte hain sir toh lagbhag do se teen minute enough hota hai buyleads wagera dekhne mein toh mujhe yeh bataiye wahan pe paanch se saat baar jab hum open karte hain jo IndiaMART hai toh paanch se saat baar har baar aisa hota hai ki jo buylead hai woh purani dikh rahi hai char ghante se zyada?

Customer: Nahi har baar toh aisa nahi hai.

Executive: Exactly right usme sir kya karna padega humko main bata deta hun. Kyunki paanch se saat baar karte ho toh yeh toh bahut achchi baat hai. Waise teen se char baar ah toh minimum karna chahiye but paanch se saat baar kar rahe ho toh it's a very good thing. Jab buylead ke section pe jab jaate ho na sir toh wahan pe na all India aap select karte hoge. All India select karne ke baad recent jab select karte hoge toh buylead hai jo recent mein aapko dikhti hogi. Ek baar na yeh bhi check kar liya karo jab buylead use kar rahe hain na jaise yeh Bangalore Karnataka ki hamare paas aa rahi hai toh Bangalore Karnataka mein of course yeh hum location ka woh daal ke kar denge ki haan that is non-relevant yeh location hai shayad woh door hai hamare se.

Customer: Right.

Executive: Uske neeche agar main aata hun that is Indore aa gaya. Gujarat aa gaya aur main nearby states ki agar main yahan pe karun toh yeh buylead dekho hume dikh rahi hai yeh Aligarh Uttar Pradesh ki hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Right jahan pe location ka filter hai na location ke filter pe ek ek aur filter aapko dikhega jisme likha hoga nearby state. Nearby state pe select karoge na aapko nearby state pe jo nearby state pe toh aa nahi rahi na koi buylead.

Executive: Nahi aa rahi hai abhi dekho khol ke dekho aapko dikhengi.

Customer: Ab aa rahi ho toh alag baat hai warna maine toh abhi kai baar check kar liya usko nearby state pe toh hamari sahi se dhang se koi aati nahi.

Executive: Ek minute rukiye nearby state ki nahi aati. Nearby state jab aap dalte ho nearby state dalne ke baad recent ke option pe click karte ho sir?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Okay abhi main check karta hun. Ek baar check kijiye check kijiye. Ek minute hold rakhiye.

Executive: Koi nahi koi nahi.

(On hold music playing)

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello ji sir.

Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai?

Customer: Yes yes yes bilkul aa rahi hai sir bilkul aa rahi hai.

Executive: Right sir recent ka toh abhi nearby state pe ek hi dikha raha hai woh bhi Aligarh 22 minute pehle uske pehle yeh hamari ek ghanta pehla Una.

Customer: Una Himachal ki yeh dikha raha hai.

Executive: Right uske alawa Panchkula Haryana ki toh nahi uske neeche dekho ek aur buylead hai aapki yeh Bhiwani Haryana ki hai dekhna wooden main door design in India yeh wali jo dikha raha hai. Yeh ek minute rukiye yeh jo buylead hai ek minute. Yeh GST verified toh buylead hai but order probably order value iski bahut kam hai ya toh yeh sample purpose ke liye ho sakta hai ya phir yeh retail ho sakti hai.

Customer: Do isme ho sakte hain.

Customer: Yeh waise hi hoga kyunki isme square feet likha hua hai. Hmm zyada ek main door ek main door hoga yeh.

Executive: Haan bilkul wahi hai ya toh retail lead ho gayi ek kisi ko chahiye ya phir sample purpose ke liye ho gayi hai.

Customer: Nahi mera customer toh kaafi purana dikh raha hai mujhe 10 saal purana dikh raha hai ispe.

Executive: Haan 10 saal purana hai bilkul hai 10 saal purana hai GST verified bhi hai customer achcha hai. Right but retail buylead mere ko dikh rahi hai ya phir sample purpose ke liye isko chahiye yeh yeh dikh raha hai. Kyunki engagement bhi iska 10 saal se basic hai but iska engagement thoda kam raha. Pehle ki agar lead wagera dekhun iski koi proper buylead wagera ya phir inquiries koi fulfill hui nahi hai toh customer purana hai genuine hai but deal wagera nahi kar raha. Is cheez pe hai yeh jo iska hai koi nahi hai main apne hand se ek baar na aapko buylead wagera search karke shaam se pehle aapko na char paanch buylead main achchi bhejta hun relevant bhejta hun apne hand se.

Customer: Ji buylead hai.

Executive: Aapke WhatsApp pe isi WhatsApp number pe send kar dun na aapko?

Customer: Ji sir iske liye isi WhatsApp pe kar dijiye.

Executive: Haan is WhatsApp pe na shaam se pehle aapko main teen char buylead na achchi achchi jo mere ko milti hai main team ko bhi bol deta hun woh aapke WhatsApp pe send kar denge. Haan kyunki sir abhi jo hamara hai yeh door ka ho gaya bed ho gaya waise hum door mein zyada deal karna cha rahe hain.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Door se achcha chal jata hai matlab phir samne wale ko kuch chahiye toh woh bhi bata deta hai door ke sath sath.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Isliye hum door ka door ke ispe kuch aisi khaas buylead aa hi nahi rahi.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Buylead toh aa rahi hai sir baat bhi chal rahi hai. Hmm hmm. Yeh buylead humne le rakhi hai do char customer se hamari baat bhi chal rahi hai. Hmm hmm. Par kuch aisa response nahi mil raha aisa lag raha hai ki woh sirf check karne ke liye search mara kar rakha hai inhone.

Executive: Bilkul dekho main batata hun aapko yeh kya ho raha hai dikkat kya thi isme aisa kyun ho raha hai buylead toh aa rahi hai proper. Right but the thing is woh jaldi na consume ho rahi hai buylead ab ek cheez bataiye jaise apni area jaise Chandni Chowk hai Chandni Chowk ka area hai right ab Chandni Chowk mein har tarike ka customer jata hai ek se ek raeesh bhi jata hai aur normal type ka bhi jata hai aur lower bhi aata hai right ab ek cheez bataiye koi bhi raeesh jo customer hai jisko achcha brand ka lena hai toh woh kya karega Chandni Chowk utrega bolega showroom pe jayega credit card swipe kiya aur direct aa gaya right?

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Right ab ek middle wala jo customer hoga woh thoda sa shayad upar bhi chala jayega showroom mein bhi chala jayega peeche gali mein ghoom ke thoda sa gali mein bhi ghoom lega right jo middle wala hoga jo chhota customer hoga woh showroom taraf jayega nahi peeche gali mein ghoom ghoom ke ghoom ghoom ke ghoom ghoom ke 10 20 dukano pe ghoomega price consult karega phir ek se lega right or not?

Customer: Bilkul bilkul.

Executive: Same jagah hai.

Executive: Same jagah hai Chandni Chowk. Kiski dukaan kahan pe listed hai exactly toh IndiaMART pe bhi aisa hai ji right jo TrustSeal hai ya phir woh hai agar kisi ki badi requirement hai let's suppose ki kisi ko chahiye ek crore ka kisi ka order hai. Right ek customer ke point of view se dekho ki ek ek crore ka koi order hai woh IndiaMART pe aaya usne search kiya usne search kiya usko upar stars flyer ya phir latest flyer ya phir TrustSeal flyer jo kara woh direct contact se deal kar lega.

Customer: Ji sir.

Executive: Aur uski jo shayad buylead hai woh shayad banegi ya nahi banegi shayad buylead bhi nahi banegi uski toh kyunki woh direct call karke deal final kar raha hai yeh wahan pe kar raha hai. Right phir toh sir aisa hi hota hai bas.

Executive: Exactly samajh pa rahe hain main kya keh raha hun?

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Ab jo exactly toh woh listing ka bhi ab hamari jo services hai sir MDC wali services hai toh usme kya hoga hume as comparison apne hand se zyada effort karna padega entertain bhi shayad zyada karna pade customer ko. Right wahi pe shayad jo main pehle keh raha tha ki hum shift karte hain jo aapka TrustSeal hai shayad wahan pe humko woh cheez thodi kam karni padti but abhi abhi jaise bola tha ki ek dedh do mahina abhi MDC use karenge toh MDC mein sir thoda samajhna padega thoda engagement hamari taraf se zyada hoga client tak jane ke liye.

Customer: Achcha achcha.

Executive: Right woh cheez humko sir mind mein dekhni padegi wahi agar main baat karun jo competitors hai jo same cheez mein deal kar rahe hain of course unke shayad jo traffic hai client base hai shayad unke paas khud ja raha hai kyunki unki TrustSeal ya usse badi services hai woh direct deal wahan se crack kar rahe hain unka jo turnover hai shayad main saal ka main baat karun kisi ka 50 crore ka turnover hai kisi ka pucho IndiaMART pe hi hai.

Customer: Bilkul bilkul sir ho raha hai aisa bhi ho raha hai.

Executive: Exactly toh woh listing ka farak hai kaun kahan pe dikh raha hai sir ab agar main Chandni Chowk mein sir pichhli kahin gali mein dikh raha hun.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Right toh wahan pe shayad mere ko apna traffic lane ke liye ya log lane ke liye shayad front jo road hai wahan pe bhi apna banner lagwana padega. Bilkul. Ki meri gali tak woh ho paye toh abhi hamari jo listing hai door tak add karna padega phir toh.

Executive: Exactly abhi hamari jo listing hai sir lagbhag starting ke teen char page pe na hoke pichhle pages pe ho rahi hai toh uske liye karna padega hume step uthana padega ki woh kaise aaye usme engagement thoda zyada lagega toh. Right sir toh woh cheez hai sir.

Customer: Ji sir ji.

Executive: Right sir samajh paaye jo main keh raha hun sir phir kaise karna hoga phir yeh hamari jo profile abhi toh kaafi neeche hogi abhi dekh bhi nahi raha ke bhai profile hamari kahan pe hai kis number pe hai toh usme mehnat toh karni hai bata aap batana aapka hai sir mehnat toh karni hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul woh ek baar na sir office pahunch jaiye. Office pahunchne ke baad na jab office pahunch jaate hain aap ek baar mere number pe miss call kar dijiye sir aapke sath na main video call pe connect karta hun sir phir. Theek hai uske baad main deeply discussion karta hun isse related theek hai sir. Theek hai theek hai sir. Theek hai sir main jaldi se connect karta hun is baar pahunch jaiye sir aur phir connect kijiye sir free hoke theek hai. Ji sir main phone back karta hun. Okay ji theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's concern about old buyleads showing.

- Wants to know how to increase ratings.

- Inquiries are low in marked locations.

- No proper response from buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained BLNI option.

- Executive explained about location filter.

- Executive will send 4-5 relevant buyleads.

- Executive will connect on video call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call after reaching office.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, trustseal, mdc, profile
